message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $14,000 for it.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value it holds, but I'm only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you consider $12,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I can only commit to $11,000. I hope we can reach a fair agreement.
